Quotes

Interviewer: They're better that way than dead though.
Ghassan Kanafani: Maybe to you, but to us it's not. To us, to liberate our country, to have dignity, to have respect, to have our mere human rights is something as essential as life itself.

- From an interview of Ghassan Kanafani. Complete Video

"I am not as arrogant as I could be, but none of us are as humble as we should be!" - Omar Abdullah (in an interview with Unfiltered)
Happiness is only real when shared.

- Christopher McCandless, from the movie Into The Wild (2007)

“Palestine belongs to the Arabs in the same sense that England belongs to the English or France to the French.”
- Mahatma Gandhi
